des: "A tart but sweet creamy punch. I often create the mixture in step 1 and save it in the refrigerator until guests arrive."
ins:
In a blender combine bananas, half-and-half, lemon juice and sugar. Bend until smooth.
Pour the banana mixture into a large punch bowl. Gently stir in the carbonated beverage. Scoop out sherbet and float on top. Serve immediately.
